caption: This video is centered around a sci-fi theme. It begins with an airplane landing, revealing massive machinery to all those present. They appear to be on an alien planet, working on a colonization mission. The protagonist, a man in a wheelchair, disembarks from the plane, wearing an oxygen mask, and marvels at the vast machinery constructed by humans on this alien world. Shortly after, inside the team's laboratory, he meets his comrades and listens to a presentation. During this time, he also encounters blue humanoid beings inside incubation pods. Fascinated by all these new experiences, he decides to record his first video to document everything.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No it isn't, it looks like a science fiction movie.
